title: Monetization While Balancing Open and Closed Source Projects with Sanket Sahu
description: Today, erxes had the opportunity to chat with Sanket Sahu about his involvement in various open and closed source projects. His project NativeBase is currently used by over 37,000 projects. Sanket uses a very unique approach to monetization and balancing multiple projects at once. So letâ€™s jump into the interview to learn more!
